attributes.action: get rid of the "hideous" London 2012 Olympic Logo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The logo for the London Olympics, unveiled 4/6/07, has been decribed by many as hideous and a waste of money.  Surveys of the public have shown the same reception to it.

I appeal to the Prime Minister to make clear the details of the selection process and seriously rethink the use of this particular logo.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
